title: Speed the plough
creator_credit: Bob Privett, Allan Crich, British Petroleum and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description: An animated film illustrating 600 years of development in agricultural implements from the ox-drawn plough to the mechanised farming equipment of today.
